description: Reimages (upgrade the operating system) one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set which don't have a ephemeral OS disk, for virtual machines who have a ephemeral OS disk the virtual machine is reset to initial state.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

tempdisk.description: Specifies whether to reimage temp disk. Default value: false.

instanceids.description: The virtual machine scale set instance ids. Omitting the virtual machine scale set instance ids will result in the operation being performed on all virtual machines in the virtual machine scale set.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

vm_scale_set_name.description: The name of the VM scale set.
